name: Adobe Flash Updater
short_description:
Another simple utility that will go out and grab the latest versions of Flash Player for Plugin based browsers, and for Internet Explorer. This will also install the shockwave player as well.

The utility will first close any browsers and processes then automatically download the latest versions from the Adobe Website. This will remove the scheduled task that Adobe creates to check for updates, and the actual updater file as well.

This Utility will also remove any lingering flash installs in the windows Macromedia folders. 
This works great on Windows 7 64 bit and is untested on windows 8, however should work.This is a x64 exe and will not work on 32bit windows.

This is a standalone exe file and there is no install. If adobe updates its flash player then there is no need to re-download this as this will find the latest version.
File has also passed Symantec's and TrendMicro-HouseCall analysis.

Version 2.4 (6-1-2015) please see discussion
summary: Utility that will grab the latest version of Flash and shockwave
